text: The main warmachine of the household. Ryzen 7 5700X, 32GB of DDR4 @3600MHz, Asus 3070 Ti ROG Strix, and plethora of different size of storage, including 500GB & 1TB NVMe SSD, 4TB 2,5" SSD, 1TB Raid 1 2,5" SSD and some old 1TB HDD not attached to machine.

Wacom pen display, in semi-regular use as third screen while deving webpages, occasionally also used for its actual purpose; digital art.

For background, see Steam Workshop.

Trusty rustbucket from 2012s, continuousliy upgraded with old parts from main PC. Sports Intel i7-9700k and 16GB of DDR4 @3200Hz. Mainly sees use as server machine, example, for Terraria or Minecraft as well as housing two discord bots of my own, Project Ambition and Small Bluebirb

Original release edition, seen lots of use on games like VRChat and Beat Saber. Now in semi-retirement, not for technical faults, but due to Facebook's/Meta's aquisition of Oculus and forceful pushing of social media to be linked with the machine and marketing info extraction.
